text:
Is there any way to get the ID or the full email of the contact when they land on Subscription Preference page?
I want to hide some of the preferences based on some property in the client contact.

You can pass along the ID and email address by adding it onto the unsubscribe link as a querystring parameter. But once you get on the page, you canâ€™t talk to the HubSpot database at all. So any information that you need to do your show/hide should be added to the link.
